name: Minimalistic Spaceship War
description:
Hello!!

This is game was made for the LÖVE Jam

Controls:

Mouse to aim, shoot and activate shield

Keyboard to move (using w,s,a,d)

The game finishes when you destroy the two big boss that will show up in 5 minutes.
>.<
Have fun! and thank you!

Changes in version v0.2 (version on LÖVE Jam):

  • Effect of bullets destroying when enemies die
  • Scores!
  • Ending message

Changes in version v0.3 (updated after LÖVE Jam):

  • Added pause menu
  • Added option to toggle fullscreen
  • Added option to turn off the music
  • Added different sound effects to enemies
  • Added reset option in menu, game over and win screen
  • Added pause on lost of focus

Please, if you are going to rate my game on the Löve2D Jam, consider the version v0.2 as it is the version that I submited to the jam. Thank you
